Recipe.Title: Beef Nacho Casserole
Recipe.RecipeIntroduction: A simple meal to whip up in less than an hour that even the kids are sure to love. Layers of seasoned ground beef, corn, tortilla chips and cheese are baked under a layer of Colby cheese.

Ingredient.Name: Shredded Cheddar or Colby Jack Cheese

ToolTip.Text: An example cooking spay is PAM.

RecipeStep.StepText: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a 9-inch pie pan with non-stick cooking spray.
RecipeStep.Title: Preheat Oven & Spray Pan

RecipeStep.StepText: In a saucepan, cook refried beans and onions (to soften them) on medium-high heat for about 5 minutes.
RecipeStep.Title: Cook Beans & Onions

RecipeStep.StepText:
Place one tortilla in the bottom of the greased pan. Spread about 1/3 cup of the bean mixture over it. Layer a few tablespoons of salsa over this. Then, place another tortilla over the salsa, and add more of the bean mixture. Follow the beans with a big handful of cheese, spreading evenly. repeat layers, spreading the ingredients evenly over the tortillas. On the top layer, make sure to use lots of salsa and cheese!

Bake until the cheese is melted, approximately 15 to 20 minutes.
